short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allow users to toggle CSS elements of popular websites on and off to eliminate distractions while they work

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension will become an assistant to help you pursue control of the time we spend every day on today's most popular entertainment platforms.

We all know how distracting and hectic these sites can be, but blocking them altogether is also not a viable option as they provide some really useful content.

We have identified those parts in each website that capture our attention and provide us with unlimited content all day long. This extension allows you to selectively hide each of these sections and even block access to any of these websites.

Note: Extensions do not access history and WE DO NOT send/store any browser related information.
--------------------------------------------------- ---
Extension developed by: ductri.it.kt@gmail.com
